sponsors.showcaseDescription: We're proud to collaborate with industry leaders who share our passion for innovation and excellence

home.subtitle: Engineering Excellence. Racing Innovation.
home.achievementsSubtitle: Pushing the limits of engineering excellence in competitive racing
home.coreValuesSubtitle: The principles that drive our success on and off the track
home.partnersSubtitle: Building lasting relationships with industry leaders
home.ctaDescription: Become part of a legacy of engineering excellence. Whether you're a student, sponsor, or enthusiast, there's a place for you in our team.

about.heroDescription: Explore the heart of TU Sofia Racing Team â€” from our cutting-edge race cars to the passionate individuals who make it all possible.

ourRaceCars.title: Our Race Cars
ourRaceCars.description: Our race cars are the result of cutting-edge engineering and meticulous design. Each car is built to perform at the highest level, combining speed, agility, and precision on the track.

ourTeam.title: Our Team
ourTeam.description: Our team is made up of passionate individuals dedicated to excellence in engineering and motorsport. Together, we combine diverse skills to build high-performance racecars.

ourHistory.title: Our History
ourHistory.description: Our team began with a shared passion for motorsport and innovation. Over the years, we've grown into a respected force in Formula Student.

joinUs.title: Join Us
joinUs.description: Apply now to join our Formula Student team and showcase your engineering skills. Be part of a dynamic project that combines innovation, teamwork, and racing.

about.ctaTitle: Ready to Be Part of Our Story?
about.ctaDescription: Join us in our pursuit of engineering excellence and racing innovation.

history.heroDescription: From a small group of passionate students to a championship-winning team, discover our journey of innovation, teamwork, and racing excellence.
history.timelineDescription: Navigate through our history to see key milestones and achievements

team.heroDescription: Passionate students from diverse backgrounds working together to build championship-winning racing cars.
team.joinCtaDescription: We're always looking for passionate students to join our racing team. Whether you're an engineer, designer, or business student, there's a place for you.

cars.pageDescription: Engineering excellence meets competitive racing. Explore our high-performance combustion engine vehicles designed and built by student engineers.

joinUs.heroTitle: Become Part of Our Racing Legacy
joinUs.heroDescription: Join our team of passionate engineers and designers. Fill out the application form below to start your journey with TU Sofia Racing Team.

form.successMessage: Thank you for your interest in joining our team. We'll review your application and get back to you soon.

placeholders.skillsPlaceholder: e.g., CAD design, CFD analysis, MATLAB programming, welding, composite materials
placeholders.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us why you want to join our racing team and what you hope to contribute

contacts.heroDescription: Have questions about our team, want to sponsor us, or interested in joining? We'd love to hear from you.

form.subject: Subject

contacts.supportDescription: Your support helps us build competitive race cars and develop the next generation of engineers.
contacts.followUsDescription: Stay updated with our latest news, race results, and behind-the-scenes content.

gallery.title: Our Racing Journey
gallery.description: Explore our collection of race cars, competitions, and team moments that define our journey to excellence

notFound.title: Out of Track
notFound.message: Looks like you've gone off the racing line! This page might be in the garage for repairs or has been retired from the circuit.

footer.about: Engineering excellence on wheels. We're TU Sofia's premier Formula Student racing team, pushing the boundaries of innovation and performance.
